class Example 
{ 
    void main() 
    {
		int[] array = new int[10];
		int i;
		int n;
		i = 0;
		while (i < 10)
		{
			array[i] = i;
			i = i + 1;
		}
		i = 0;
		while(i < 10)
		{
			n = array[i];
			printNumber(n);
			System.out(' ');
			i = i + 1;
		}
    }
	
	int printNumber(int number)
	{
		if (number == 0)
			System.out('0');
		else
			rec_printNumber(number);
		return 0;
	}
	
	int rec_printNumber(int number)
	{
		int rest;
		int div;
		if (number != 0)
		{
			rest = number % 10;
			div = number / 10;
			rec_printNumber(div);
			rest = rest + 48;
			System.out(rest);
		}
		else ;
		return 0;
	}
	
	int fib(int i)
	{
		int a;
		int b;
		if (i == 0)
		{
			return i;
		}
		else
		{
			if (i == 1)
			{
				return 1;
			}
			else
			{
				a = i - 1;
				b = i - 2;
				return fib(a) + fib(b);
			}
		}
	}
}
